New Records: Cape Verde secured a late stoppage-time winner in the match
Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a winning goal for Cape Verde in the 90th minute
Alexander Djiku scored an equalizer for Ghana in the 55th minute
Rodrigues had a late chance saved by Ghana's goalkeeper
Ghana had a penalty claim turned down by VAR
Cape Verde went ahead in the 17th minute with a goal by Jamiro Monteiro
Ghana's goalkeeper Richard Ofori made a mistake leading to Cape Verde's first goal
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's victory put pressure on Ghana's next match against Egypt
Ghana manager Otto Addo expressed frustration at the late loss
Others: The match was part of Group B at the AFCON 2024 tournament
